articles.description: The police reassure England players that online racist abuse will be "taken seriously" during this summer's European Championship.
articles.title: Euro 2024: England players meet police over concerns of racist abuse online

articles.description: The Olympic spotlight can inject money and new participants into a sport and the fight to get a place on the programme is as fierce as ever.
articles.title: Olympics: New sports vie for places: Dodgeball, frisbee, teqball

articles.description: Nottingham Forest fail in an appeal against their four-point punishment for breaching Premier League profit and sustainability rules.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest: Appeal rejected against four-point penalty

articles.description: Kyren Wilson compared himself to Rocky Balboa and says he wants to “build a legacy” in snooker after claiming his first world title.
articles.title: World Championship: Kyren Wilson wants to 'build legacy' after winning first world title

articles.description: Diego Maradona's "stolen" Golden Ball trophy, awarded for being named the best player at the 1986 World Cup, has been found and will go to auction in France on 6 June.
articles.title: Diego Maradona: 'Stolen' Golden Ball to be auctioned off

articles.description: Talor Gooch’s invitation to play next week’s US PGA Championship at Valhalla is a significant step for men's professional golf, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: US PGA Championship: Talor Gooch invite to major at Valhalla important for men's golf

articles.description: Louis Rees-Zammit praises the advice of quarterback Patrick Mahomes as he continues his transition to American football with the Kansas City Chiefs.
articles.title: Louis Rees-Zammit: Kansas City Chiefs convert praises advice of quarterback Patrick Mahomes

articles.description: Italy's Jonathan Milan sprints to victory on stage four at the Giro d'Italia as Tadej Pogacar retains his overall lead.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia: Jonathan Milan sprints to victory on stage four

articles.description: Watch as a Milwaukee Brewers fan gets hyped after leaping to catch Gary Sanchez's home-run ball.
articles.title: MLB: Milwaukee Brewers fan celebrates catch in crowd

articles.description: Eliud Kipchoge says his family received threats on social media after the death of fellow marathon runner Kelvin Kiptum.
articles.title: Eliud Kipchoge's family threatened after death of Kelvin Kiptum
